mapper.update:
update agent_sys_log
type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
request_uri = #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method_description = #{methodDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update agent_sys_log set type = #{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, request_ip = #{requestIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, request_uri = #{requestUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_name = #{methodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method_description = #{methodDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, message = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM agent_sys_log
type = #{type} AND
operator = #{operator} AND
request_ip = #{requestIp} AND
request_uri LIKE CONCAT('%',#{requestUri},'%') AND
method_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{methodName},'%') AND
method_description LIKE CONCAT('%',#{methodDescription},'%') AND
start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND NOW()
start_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
